an4.92:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.92:4.3: One person has internal serenity of heart, but not the higher wisdom of discernment of principles.
an4.92:4.4: One person has the higher wisdom of discernment of principles, but not internal serenity of heart.
an4.92:4.5: One person has neither internal serenity of heart, nor the higher wisdom of discernment of principles.
an4.92:4.6: One person has both internal serenity of heart, and the higher wisdom of discernment of principles.
an4.92:4.7: These are the four people found in the world.”
